name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wise Dash: Your personal new tab dashboard!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimise your new tab page with a powerful, efficient and customisable dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wise Dash is an innovative new tab extension for your browser functioning as a productivity-boosting dashboard. It's enhancing efficiency and organization in one convenient interface by integrating your calendar events, to-do lists, fitness apps and more.

ðŸ’» Feature Highlights:
ðŸ’¡ChatGPT: Interact with ChatGPT right on your dashboard and use the powerful AI.
ðŸ’¡To Do: View and manage all your existing to do lists from Todoist, Google Task and Microsoft To Do.
ðŸ’¡Strava: See your latest activities with a convenient summary of your stats.
ðŸ’¡Jira: View your active Jira tickets and easily transition their status.
ðŸ’¡Discord: View and easily access your Discord servers.
ðŸ’¡Binance: View the current prices of all your favourite Crypto.
ðŸ’¡Twitch: View who's live, what they are playing all from your dashboard.
ðŸ’¡Trello: Easily see and manage your Trello cards in your Trello boards.
ðŸ’¡Calendar: See your upcoming calendar events automatically from Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook.
ðŸ’¡Chess.com: See all your current games and how much time you've got left to make your winning move!
ðŸ’¡Duolingo: Your current streak front and centre.
ðŸ’¡Fitbit: Never loose track of your weight or daily steps again.
ðŸ’¡Weather: Your local weather forecast easily accessible. 
ðŸ’¡Time Zones: Easily view what time it is everywhere in the world.
ðŸ’¡Background: Customise the background to your liking with daily changing wallpapers, videos or any colour you like!
ðŸ’¡Wikipedia: Grow your wisdom by adding Wikipedia's featured article of the day to your dashboard!
ðŸ’¡And more!

ðŸ“’ How Wise Dash works:
Login using your Google or Microsoft account to automatically connect your calendar and to do lists. To link other apps and customise all other dashboard features visit the settings page.
